Login_popup.login_by_send_code: Enter your email to receive a confirmation code
Login_popup.send_magic_link: A confirmation code has been sent to <address>{email}</address>. Enter the code below and click Submit to log in.
Login_popup.select_inforamiton: Please select your country and channel afrom the options below.

Map_guide.attempts_deduction: 1 heart deducted for each incorrect answer.
Map_guide.time_limit_per_quiz: Each quiz has a 30 sec time limit. Each stage has a limit of 5 incorrect quiz attempts.
Map_guide.you_have_5_attemps: If you reach the 5 incorrect quiz limit, you must restart at the first question of that stage.
Map_guide.giveup_or_interrupt_quiz: If you quit a stage or it is interrupted, you must restart at the first question of that stage.
Map_guide.answer_first_attempt: Total points awarded will vary based on: answering correctly on the first attempt; giving consecutive correct answers; stage completion; number of remaining attempts.

Completed.congratulation: Congratulations! You have earned the Galaxy AI Expert Badge
Completed.rank_notification: You are ranked in the top XX %
Completed.badge_deliver: Your badge is being issued. Please allow up to 5 minutes for it to appear.

Score_guide.base_score_description: Each correct answer is worth 20 points
Score_guide.combo_score_description: Each consecutive correct answer earns you an additional 2 points
Score_guide.remaiing_attempts_description: Upon completion of the stage, you will receive 10 points for each remaining attempt.

Alert.alert_notification: No attempts remaining. Do you want to retry? Selecting “No” will return you to stage selection.
Alert.network_error: The network is unstable. Please try again later.
Alert.code_error: The verification code is invalid. Please check again.
Alert.email_error: We are unable to complete your login. Please check the email address.
